Interface DigitalOceanClient

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, com.github.cowwoc.digitalocean.internal.client.InternalClient
public interface DigitalOceanClient extends AutoCloseable, com.github.cowwoc.digitalocean.internal.client.InternalClient
A client of the DigitalOcean REST API.

      static DigitalOceanClient using(String accessToken)
      Creates a new client.
      Parameters:
      accessToken - an API access token
      Returns:
      a new client
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if accessToken is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if accessToken contains leading or trailing whitespace or is empty
